Name: Vision Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Toscana Le Cupole Rosso
Wine Description: Sweet, captivating red cherry aroma complicated by floral red berries and a touch of grass. Very refreshing though not particularly complex on the palate, where a burst of ripe, juicy red cherry fruit is joined by cedar and tobacco. The fairly long finish boasts a very smooth texture.

Name: Monterey Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of black plum, cherry, rhubarb and hints of earth and loam. Flavors of red plum, raspberry and blood orange are underpinned by distinctive river stone minerality and savory umami character.

Name: Barbera d'Asti Superiore
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Ruelas Reserva
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Signature Malbec
Wine Description: Intense purple colour with aromas of blackberry, black cherry framed by hints of spice and mint. Featured flavours are repeated on the palate and harmoniously combined with ripe plum and subtle notes of vanilla, bitters weet chocolate and mint on the finish. This wine is full-bodied, velvety with a pleasant lingering finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It flashes a whole range of berry flavors from wild blackberry to blueberry to Rainier cherry. This blend of fruit rides atop notes of wet earth, black tea and warm Indian spice notes. The finish is bright and long lasting.

Name: Minervois
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pissarres
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe fruit, spicy, mineral notes with light rosemary and thyme. With great structure and concentration, aromas of black fruit in jam and toasted notes, round and soft tannins in a lake end and pleasant.

Name: Umbria Baiocco Rosso
Wine Description: it has brilliant ruby red in colour; the nose opens with fruity and floral notes of cherry and red fruit; on the palate it is lively and balanced with a pleasant and fresh fruity finish.

Name: Two Estates Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dark cherry, blackberry, briar, cola, black tea, orange peel, stems ripe blackberry, black currant, dark cherry, baking spices, black plum, cola structured with ample tannins and good acidity.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pure Paso Proprietary Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Monga Zin Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Deep black cherry fruit, dried cranberry, orange zest, berry patch in the sun! Dusty vanilla-caramel oak, graham crackers, and cocoa. Fragrant Moroccan-Asian spices—Chinese 5-spice mélange… Mouthfeel is creamy yet tangy bright cherry, firm-sturdy tannins and a long, lush finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Appearance: Deep garnet. Aromas: Dark cherry, clove, blackberry, and violets open up in the glass, followed by traces of tobacco. Hints of vanilla and cocoa dust add complexity to the rich aroma. Flavors: Smooth entry, with lively ripe, fresh berries followed by vanilla and cocoa flavors that fill the palate. Smooth and textural, with generous body and supple tannins. Very well balanced. The finish evokes dark cherry and sage, with hints of allspice and vanilla that linger seamlessly.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Medium-bodied, fruity with a dry finish. Lots of black berries and raspberry on the nose and palate. Soft tannins on the finish with hints of vanilla and oak.

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Rich ruby color. It is an intense wine with juicy fruits, spice and silky smooth tannins. It displays bright aromas of Bing cherry, blackberry jam, vanilla, and white pepper.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: 337 Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Lively aromas of black cherry, ripe currant, fresh herbs and lightly roasted coffee. Supple tannins and balanced acidity support core flavors of blackberry, black cherry and toasty oak, intertwined with spicy black pepper accents. It is rich and complex, and so may be enjoyed on its own or with a range of cuisine.

Name: Love You Bunches Sangiovese
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserve Bourbon Barrel Aged Zinfandel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: Shiraz is created with a simple philosophy in mind - to make a great wine that everyone can enjoy anytime in any place. Enjoy this wine with a bunch of friends and a hearty BBQ steak.

Name: Palisades Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A perfect picnic has balanced acidity and light tannins. It is packed with flavorful aromatics of fresh cherry pie, with bright strawberry jam and candied raspberries with a kiss of cinnamon.

Name: Confidences de Prieuré-Lichine Margaux
Wine Description: Quite a sweet-fruit nose makes itself known to start with, then ripe flavors and modest tannins make this very approachable. It’s only the finish that’s a little dry and angular.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe plum, cola, and cherry tobacco lead to flavors of black cherry, blueberry, and mocha. A wonderful balance of Russian River Valley fruit and integrated Damy French Oak flavors linger on the palate.

Name: Barbera d'Alba
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Anderson Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This medium weight wine is well-balanced with the bright acidity leaving for a long finish. The aroma is rich with dark cherries, nutmeg, caramelized apple, cinnamon, and clove. The palate is full of plum, spice, cherry, strawberry, and vanilla oak.

Name: Devois de Perret Languedoc Rouge
Wine Description: Shiny and Purple. Nose Flavors of red berries and cocoa. Mouthhole in mouth that enhances the crisp side.

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Rich deep cherry, black fruit and fresh berry forward taste with deep wonderful structure and color. Luscious plum, cinnamon, wild strawberries with a ruddy cherry sweetness fill up this extra voluptuous and sultry Chianti Classico. The fruit is well balanced and made bright by great acidity. Elegant and lengthy in the finish.

Name: Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir delle Venezie
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Mascota Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine displays a deep red colour with hints of violet. Aromas of liquorice, cassis and warm raspberry jam. Elegant touch of roasted pepper and chocolate. Full bodied, complex, very long aftertaste.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of cherry, strawberry and toasty oak burst in the glass. Dark cherry and chocolate flavors fill the mouth with a rich intensity. The palate of the wine is plush and subtle but with a firm texture and finish.

Name: Max's Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbera d'Alba
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir

Name: Chianti Superiore
Wine Description: The color is intense ruby ​​red, the nose reveals fresh and fruity notes reminiscent the wild violet, berry, cherry and plum, perfectly integrated into a full and round structure. Ready to drink, it's nice and soft, round and persistent.

Name: Le Petit Clos
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Sotto Castello di Novello Barolo
Wine Description: Black cherry, plum, mocha, cloves and licorice meld together in a juicy, explosive Barolo with considerable near and medium-term appeal.

Name: Woodcutter's Shiraz
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Boaz Testa Vineyard Zero
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Señorío de P. Peciña Crianza
Wine Description: Cherry-red colour and slightly orange rim. intense aroma of ripe fruit, with hints of vanilla and toasted wood, with jam coming through underneath. tasty, smooth, pleasant, spicy, very well-balanced and rounded.

Name: Nerojbleo
Wine Description: It has ruby red, with deep violet reflections. It has elegant, harmonious, lingering finish.

Name: Red
Wine Description: Dark colour, effusive perfume, and rich, long flavours and textures. A bountiful glass brimming with aromatics of cigar box, brambly fruit and cacao. The palate gives way to an even-keeled expression of cherries, violets, umeboshi, savoury tannins and liquorice.

Name: La Gloriette Vieilles Vignes Saint-Joseph
Wine Description: Dark garnet color. An intense and complex nose combining black fruit aromas with walls. And grilled and smoky notes.

Name: Sancerre Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Centine Rosso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Apogeo Nebbiolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chianti
Wine Description: Nice ruby red color, on the nose red cherry and floral notes,on the palate, freshness and intensity in harmony with soft tannin.

Name: Kermit Lynch Côtes du Rhône
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Don Nicanor Malbec
Wine Description: Intense wine with well-defined profile, deep red hue with remarkable shades of purple and blue. The nose has intense aromas of plum and cassis with subtle vanilla notes. The mouth is elegant, fresh, delicate and has medium structure.

Name: Sonoma County Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It shows loads of up-front fruit, with pretty blackberry, black cherry, and plum flavors. These flavors broaden on the mid-palate as the wine gains in richness and adds hints of dried herbs. The finish is smooth with very little tannins. This is definitely drinkable now and while it should last fine for a few years, it is ideal for nearer term consumption.

Name: Zinfandel Party Line
Wine Description: A big burst of wild berry fruit and brimming over the top of the glass with raspberry fruit, just baked buttery croissant, and caraway and nut bread. A classic Biale balancing act of fruit expression and elegance.

Name: Freakshow Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot noir
Wine Description: The 2014 Cep pinot noir is really delicious. It is made up mostly of barrels from the 35 acres of Pinot noir we grow at our estate vineyard. The remaining barrels come from Campbell Vineyard and the Occidental region of the Sonoma Coast. The 2014 delivers the balance, elegance and complexity you would expect from de-classified barrels of Peay Vineyards Estate Pinot noirs. The high toned nose is captivating with raspberry/strawberry notes mingled with deeper anise and tea notes. The mouth feel is round though precise with a medium length finish brought into focus by refreshing acidity.

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: This is a simple, fruity wine without great tannic structure. It has attractive berry fruits and a dry core. With its fresh acidity, it will be ready to drink soon.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: A wine with an intense bouquet and balanced tannins that express all the characteristics of the "terroir" in terms of its quality and type, both in the selection of clones and in the selection of the best-situated and sunniest terrain.

Name: Embruix
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Clean and bright. Deep cherry colour with purple glints. On the nose it is very complex. Excellent harmony: strawberry, blackberry and figs; some hints of milky aromas; the ageing results in a clean and new wood with toast, coffee, vanilla, leather and cocoa aromas. On the palate, powerful, extraordinary backbone and elegant. Sweet polished tannins perfectly balanced with spicy and fruity flavours. Smooth and lingering finish.

Name: Côtes de Bordeaux
Wine Description: Vanilla aromas dominate the nose, but I also found some cherry, plum, raspberry, leather and cinnamon aromatics with moderate intensity. The balance is reasonable despite the heavy vanilla. The palate brings a mouthfeel that’s lacking depth, but it has nice flavors such as cherry, raspberry and plum fruit (with restrained sweetness) along with some earthy mushroom and tea flavors

Name: Reserva Mountain Blend
Wine Description: Colour: Red violet with good intensity. Aroma: Complex nose with typical Malbec aromas of red and black fruits such as cherries, plums and jam, expressing both spicy and vanilla notes, snuff, coffee and chocolate showing the time in oak. Flavour: In the mouth, the Cabernet Franc adds dark fruit and tannins, making a perfect combination that results in a complex, elegant wine of great concentration.

Name: Vitiano Rosso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Dark black cherry to the eye, this has a tantalizing bouquet of raspberry, black cherry and iodine with a touch of brambles. The palate offers a sophisticated mélange of blackberry and black cherry with strong notes of leather and toffee.

Name: Rasteau
Wine Description: Dried black fruit, smoke and dark spice on the nose and palate of this French red wine blend of Grenache and Syrah that express the Rasteau terroir of the Rhone.

Name: Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Hints of blackberry, caramel, roast coffee and toasted oak.

Name: Bramare Malbec Uco Valley
Wine Description: Aromas of red fruits, plum, cherry, and cassis. delicate floral hints to violet complemented by spices like tobacco and cinnamon. Firm, sweet tannins.

Name: Carmenère Limited Edition
Wine Description: Complex and elegant. With blackfruits, spice and savoury notes.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright aromas and flavors of spiced berries, roasted chestnut, and cocoa with a silky, bright, fruity light-to-medium body and a seamless, interesting, medium-length black raspberry custard finish with well-integrated, chewy tannins and moderate oak. A smooth and satisfying cabernet that will cover a lot of bases.

Name: Jumilla Blue Label
Wine Description: Purple/black in colour, it proffers a nose of pain grille, graphite, earth notes, spice box, black fruits, and a hint of balsamic. It opens in the glass to reveal density, savory flavors and a lengthy, pure finish.

Name: St. Giorgio Chianti Riserva
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Soft with swarming notes of bramble fruits, cherry pie, and cranberries. While it is vibrant and delicious in its youth the focused tannins suggest aging with grace. French oak has contributed a velvety softness without masking the lovely red and black fruit characteristics.

Name: Carmignano Riserva
Wine Description: It has aromas of ripe fruit, cassis and raspberries, embellished with elegant hints of tobacco, chocolate and sweet spices.

Name: Mendoza Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Plum and tobacco on the nose and palate. Big Old World with a truffley nuance and an amazing peppery acidity to frame and carry the red fruit flavors. The finish is subtle and persistent, with refined dusty tannins.

Name: Diamond Collection Monterey County Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine has an interesting story best told by our winemaker Corey Beck: “Our Diamond Collection Pinot Noir is sourced from a vineyard just east of the Santa Lucia Highlands in Monterey Country. This vineyard was originally planted with Merlot vines – however, after a few years of working with it, we realized its Bay-influenced cool temperatures and abundant afternoon sunshine created potential for producing great Pinot Noir.

Name: Sangre de Toro
Wine Description: Deep ruby colour with a hint of ochre. Rich complex Mediterranean aromas with exuberant notes of spices and blackberries. Velvety tannins are noted on the palate with elegant flavours of liquorice and small dark forest fruits

Name: Givry Premier Cru 'Servoisine'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mother's Milk Shiraz
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barolo del Comune di La Morra
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Arbui
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Earthquake Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Wine Description: Intense aromas of fresh, red fruits and forest floor with a touch of sweet spices. The taste is medium-bodied, round and elegant with silky tannins and a long lasting finish.

Name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Fragrant aromas of plum and black cherry find perfect balance with hints of vanilla, cola, cloves and cocoa dust. Right on the heels of all that aromatic intensity are interwoven layers of blackberry, boysenberry, black currant, dark plums and mocha. This wine is full bodied with supple tannins and a long, generous finish.

Name: Acinatico Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
Wine Description: Intense ruby red color. Intense bouquet, delicate and aethereal with scent of spices and vanilla. The flavour is warm, full-bodied with scent of fruit that recalls Amarone.

Name: Classic Merlot - Argaman
Wine Description: It has fruity and velvety, with a long finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon (Cs)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Il Pettirosso
Wine Description: Colour: ruby red tending to garnet. Bouquet: intense, delicate, plum in alcohol. Taste: dry, harmonic, slightly tannic.

Name: Tempranillo
Wine Description: A floral red-fruit nose opens this juicy yet basic Tempranillo. Raw edginess on the palate comes with candied plum and raspberry flavors, while this finishes fresh, with a modest salty note.

Name: Montefalco Rosso
Wine Description: Flowers, red fruit and a touch of nutmeg. Dry, cool and soft.

Name: Mt. Jefferson Cuvée Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It presents a beautiful nose of cherry, cola, general dark fruit with a solid frame. Nice, feminine Oregon frame with good berry, forest and herb flavor.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Deep and bright with light shades of garnet red. Its bouquet is penetrating, very full and varied, reminiscent of wild berries. On the palate it is dry, warm, full-bodied, harmonious, delicate and austere at the same time, persistent.

Name: Virgen Vineyards USDA Organic Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Hautes Terres Listrac-Médoc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: The wine has aromas of blackberries and cherries, and flavors of plums, red fruit, and cocoa. Coupled with supple tannins, hints of spice and mocha give this wine a complex character and good structure. Oak aging adds comforting vanilla accents to the smooth finish.

Name: Old Eight Cut Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A
